channel.title: INfood
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfood, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Crustless Pumpkin Pie
item.description: Crustless pumpkin pie has rich spices, creamy pumpkin, and a perfectly smooth texture. The custard holds its shape beautifully. Whether…

item.title: Cozy Curry Noodle Soup (Thai-Inspired)
item.description: Cooler weather means one thing: cozy soups on repeat ! Our new go-to is this Thai-inspired noodle soup with coconut milk, curry paste, veggies, and yo...

item.title: Crockpot Carrots
item.description: Description: sweet, savory, garlicky. The carrots should be fork-tender, not mushy. They smell AMAZING while they cook–more savory than sweet…

item.title: 1-Pot Spicy Pumpkin Tomato Soup
item.description: Busy, chilly days call for EASY, warming soups! Enter: Our 1-POT Spicy Pumpkin Soup with coconut milk, tomatoes, and warming Caribbean-inspired spices...

item.title: Fluffy Pumpkin Oat Cookies (1 Bowl!)
item.description: Looking for a cookie filled with fall flavor? This is it! Fluffy, cinnamon-spiced, pecan-studded pumpkin oat cookies made in 1 bowl in 30 minutes ! Th...

item.title: Giblet Gravy
item.description: Giblet gravy is a labor of love, but the flavor is unmatched! Using the turkey’s neck, gizzard, heart, liver, and…

item.title: Easy Gluten-Free Cornbread (1 Bowl!)
item.description: It’s no secret we love cornbread and have shared recipes for it before (exhibits A and B). And we wouldn’t be posting another version if it wasn’t wor...

item.title: Angel Chicken and Rice Casserole

item.title: Dry Brine Turkey
item.description: When you dry brine your turkey, you end up with a beautifully browned bird with crispy skin on the outside…
